title: How this session of 2020-21 going to be different for students? - Quora

response.answer_text: The forced attention to Net -based classes will possibly benefit those students who were earlier depending on others to browse the net and give them ready downloaded material to prepare their assignments,. A longer attention span to video talks would now actually actually add to the reach of the Digital medium in Lower level education. There is an under reported problem arising in the Primary Education side. Vested interests have started sabotaging the Net based classes for children. Parents and grand parents are being poisoned with the message that Little children exposed to digital media will get addicted to it and spoil their eyesight,, and also that they will find easier access to porn sites etc. .The topic has started to divide families —one section wanting the children to overcome the digital divide and the other insisting on preventing children’s independent access to what they need to and can learn,

They won’t have to go to school but will get pushed up a grade. Then communities and celebrities like Oprah Winfrey are going to fawn all over them for the great accomplishments they have done. In the meantime, society will have to dumb things down because there is no way that missing two years of school is going to make the kids of today very smart. Yes, there may be a few geniuses still out there that will make a difference, but if schools are not going to take schooling seriously, they will be far fewer between.
